# mirascope.core.base.tool

<ApiType type="Module" />

## Description

This module defines the base class for tools used in LLM calls.

<Info title="Usage">

[Tools](/docs/mirascope/learn/tools)

</Info>

## Module Attributes

| Name | Type | Description |
| ---- | ---- | ----------- |
| ToolConfig |  | A base class for tool configurations. |
| GenerateJsonSchemaNoTitles |  |  |
| BaseTool |  | A class for defining tools for LLM calls.

Example:

```python
from mirascope.core import BaseTool
from pydantic import Field


class FormatBook(BaseTool):
    """Returns a nicely formatted book recommendation."""

    title: str = Field(..., description="The title of the book.")
    author: str = Field(..., description="The author of the book.")

    def call(self) -> str:
        return f"{self.title} by {self.author}"
``` |
